includedAssets.title: The Blair Witch Project
includedAssets.synopsis: Frightening tale following three film students as they travel to Maryland to make a film about a local urban legend, the Blair Witch.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Frightening tale following three film students as they travel to Maryland to make a film about a local urban legend, the Blair Witch.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Frightening tale following three film students as they travel to Maryland to make a film about a local urban legend, the Blair Witch.

includedAssets.title: Blair Witch
includedAssets.synopsis: Grieving brother James Donahue (James Allen McCune) leads a group of friends  into Maryland's Black Hills Forest to uncover the mystery surrounding the disappearance of his sister who, legend has it, vanished at the hands of the notorious Blair Witch.  At first the group is hopeful, especially when a pair of locals offer to act as guides through the woods. But as an endless night wears on, they are brutally haunted by a menacing presence. Director Adam Wingard (The Guest) revisits the cinematic horror legend with this efficient sequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Found-footage horror sequel about a brother searching for the sister who went missing in the woods years before.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Grieving brother James Donahue (James Allen McCune) leads a group of friends  into Maryland's Black Hills Forest to uncover the mystery surrounding the disappearance of his sister who, legend has it, vanished at the hands of the notorious Blair Witch.  At first the group is hopeful, especially when a pair of locals offer to act as guides through the woods. But as an endless night wears on, they are brutally haunted by a menacing presence. Director Adam Wingard (The Guest) revisits the cinematic horror legend with this efficient sequel.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: Blair Witch 2 Film Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: A group of film students venture into the mysterious Black Hills Forest to document a local urban legend in 1999's found footage classic, before a brother enters the wood in search of his missing sister in 2016's sequel. Chilling horror double-bill.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Three film students venture into a forest to document an urban legend. Later, a man enters the wood in search of his sister. Chilling horror.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A group of film students venture into the mysterious Black Hills Forest to document a local urban legend in 1999's found footage classic, before a brother enters the wood in search of his missing sister in 2016's sequel. Chilling horror double-bill.
